Module org.example.numbattlers
Package org.example.numbattlers

Class Ask

java.lang.Object
org.example.numbattlers.src.internal.entity.Ask
public class Ask extends Object
This class is used by Game to ask the player for a response to a question. Implements some attributes of the question.
